vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.8.2;
son of: Samuel (H8050);
brother of: Joel (H3100)
§ Abia or Abiah or Abijah = "Jehovah is (my) father"
1) king of Judah, son and successor of Rehoboam
2) second son of Samuel
3) son of Jeroboam the first, king of Israel
4) son of Becher, a Benjamite
5) head of a priestly house (one of the 24 Levite groups)
6) head of a priestly house (after the exile)
7) wife of Hezron
8) mother of Hezekiah (cf H021)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Béquer, hijo de Benjamín; (b)   esposa de Hesrón; (c)   hijo de Samuel; (d)   sacerdote; tribu de Leví; (e) אֲבִיָּם ,אֲבִיָּהוּ   hijo de Roboam; rey de Judá (913-911/10); (f)   hijo de Jeroboam; (g) אֲבִי   hija de Zacarías; esposa de Ahaz; madre de Ezequías; (h)   sacerdote; tribu de Leví\hijo de Roboam; rey de Judá (913-911/10)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比亞, 亞比雅, 亞比央 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華是父親"
1) 猶大王, 羅波安的兒子
2) 撒母耳的第二個兒子
3) 耶羅波安的兒子 (王上 14:1)
4) 便雅憫人比結的兒子 (代上 7:8)
5) 祭司家族的首長 (24利未支族之一) (代上 24:10)
6) 祭司家族的首長 (被擄後)
7) 希斯崙的妻子 (代上 2:24)
8) 希西家的母親 (參見 021) (代下 29:1)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚比亚, 亚比雅, 亚比央 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华是父亲"
1) 犹大王, 罗波安的儿子
2) 撒母耳的第二个儿子
3) 耶罗波安的儿子 (王上 14:1)
4) 便雅悯人比结的儿子 (代上 7:8)
5) 祭司家族的首长 (24利未支族之一) (代上 24:10)
6) 祭司家族的首长 (被掳后)
7) 希斯仑的妻子 (代上 2:24)
8) 希西家的母亲 (参见 021) (代下 29:1)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.14.1;
son of: Jeroboam (H3379);
brother of: Nadab (H5070H)
§ Abia or Abiah or Abijah = "Jehovah is (my) father"
1) king of Judah, son and successor of Rehoboam
2) second son of Samuel
3) son of Jeroboam the first, king of Israel
4) son of Becher, a Benjamite
5) head of a priestly house (one of the 24 Levite groups)
6) head of a priestly house (after the exile)
7) wife of Hezron
8) mother of Hezekiah (cf H021)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.14.31;
son of: Rehoboam (H7346) and Maacah (H4601K);
brother of: Attai (H6262I), Ziza (H2124H) and Shelomith (H8019);
father of: Asa (H0609);
half-brother of: Jeush (H3266K), Shemariah (H8114H) and Zaham (H2093); also called Abijam (KJV: Abia) at 1Ki.14.31; 15.1,7,8;
§ Abia or Abiah or Abijah = "Jehovah is (my) father"
1) king of Judah, son and successor of Rehoboam
2) second son of Samuel
3) son of Jeroboam the first, king of Israel
4) son of Becher, a Benjamite
5) head of a priestly house (one of the 24 Levite groups)
6) head of a priestly house (after the exile)
7) wife of Hezron
8) mother of Hezekiah (cf H021)

A womanof the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.24; married to Hezron (H2696H);
mother of: Ashhur (H0806); also translated "his father" (NIV: Abijah);
§ Abia or Abiah or Abijah = "Jehovah is (my) father"
1) king of Judah, son and successor of Rehoboam
2) second son of Samuel
3) son of Jeroboam the first, king of Israel
4) son of Becher, a Benjamite
5) head of a priestly house (one of the 24 Levite groups)
6) head of a priestly house (after the exile)
7) wife of Hezron
8) mother of Hezekiah (cf H021)

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.8;
son of: Becher (H1071);
brother of: Zemirah (H2160), Joash (H3135), Eliezer (H0461I), Elioenai (H0454I), Omri (H6018H), Jeremoth (H3406H), Anathoth (H6068H) and Alemeth (H5964H)
§ Abia or Abiah or Abijah = "Jehovah is (my) father"
1) king of Judah, son and successor of Rehoboam
2) second son of Samuel
3) son of Jeroboam the first, king of Israel
4) son of Becher, a Benjamite
5) head of a priestly house (one of the 24 Levite groups)
6) head of a priestly house (after the exile)
7) wife of Hezron
8) mother of Hezekiah (cf H021)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.10
Also named: Abia<\i> (Ἀβιά "Abijah" G0007H)
§ Abia or Abiah or Abijah = "Jehovah is (my) father"
1) king of Judah, son and successor of Rehoboam
2) second son of Samuel
3) son of Jeroboam the first, king of Israel
4) son of Becher, a Benjamite
5) head of a priestly house (one of the 24 Levite groups)
6) head of a priestly house (after the exile)
7) wife of Hezron
8) mother of Hezekiah (cf H021)

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.10.7
§ Abia or Abiah or Abijah = "Jehovah is (my) father"
1) king of Judah, son and successor of Rehoboam
2) second son of Samuel
3) son of Jeroboam the first, king of Israel
4) son of Becher, a Benjamite
5) head of a priestly house (one of the 24 Levite groups)
6) head of a priestly house (after the exile)
7) wife of Hezron
8) mother of Hezekiah (cf H021)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.18.2;
daughter of: Zechariah (H2148C); married to Ahaz (H0271);
mother of: Hezekiah (H2396); also called Abijah at 2Ch.29.1;
Another name of a.vi (אֲבִי "Abi" H0021)
§ Abia or Abiah or Abijah = "Jehovah is (my) father"
1) king of Judah, son and successor of Rehoboam
2) second son of Samuel
3) son of Jeroboam the first, king of Israel
4) son of Becher, a Benjamite
5) head of a priestly house (one of the 24 Levite groups)
6) head of a priestly house (after the exile)
7) wife of Hezron
8) mother of Hezekiah (cf H021)
